founder_story.title: Our story, our mission
founder_story.name: Benjamin Brassart, Founder of Solenca
founder_story.p1: When arriving on the Costa Brava, we discovered a paradise... and the challenges that come with it for a second-home owner. Managing remotely, finding trustworthy professionals, making sure everything is fine while away: these issues quickly became obvious.
founder_story.p2: Solenca was born from this personal experience. Our mission is simple: to offer you the peace of mind we would have loved to have. We put the client and trust at the heart of our project, so your only concern is enjoying your home.

services_page.faq_intro: Not sure yet? Here are the answers to the most common questions.

faq.question: How does the subscription work?
faq.answer: You subscribe to our Serenity plan which includes control visits. Then you can add the modules of your choice (pool, garden, etc.). The subscription is the mandatory base to access other services.

faq.question: What does a control visit include exactly?
faq.answer: We check inside and outside: doors, windows, humidity, electricity, pool, garden, mailbox. Any issue is reported immediately with photos.

faq.question: What happens in case of a problem?
faq.answer: You are alerted immediately. Depending on the issue, we can either solve it directly or quickly call one of our trusted contractors after your approval.

faq.question: Can I cancel easily?
faq.answer: Yes. Our subscriptions are non-binding. You can cancel at any time via a simple email, with no hidden fees.
